Text: Um... No one saw me, right...?
Better get more for storage.
It's on Commandant.
Hehe, I'll buy a takeaway.
Bambinata wants to try today's dessert with Mistress.
Okay! Bambinata will sit down and have it with you!
It's sweet. Bambinata likes it. ●▽●
Is there anything I can help with?
The sweet soup is great, Commandant. I saved one for you.
I'll come back to help out tomorrow!
Hmm? Lulu is open again?
The desserts here are quite tasty.
I wanna bring Diana here.
I want to try some new food combinations...
It tastes... not bad. ≧▽≦
Commandant... what kind of dessert do you think I should bring to Cecily?
Let me see what else Lulu has...
What? Why is this sorbet so smooth and refreshing?
T-this is unbelievably tasty! I'm gonna have another taste of it tomorrow.
I heard you serve Kowloong delicacies here.
Interesting innovation. Not bad.
Check out. Keep the change.
Is that a house made of gingerbread men?
Raaawr! What is this? Shark-speare's gonna have lots of it!
Excuse me, can I pay with gingerbread men?
I wonder how much it costs...
Such a big portion. Can they even make money this way?
It's too sweet! Can I have a bigger discount?
What should I have...?
Maybe I can get something else?
Great! I'll come back tomorrow!
President Hassen sent me here to have a look...
This looks good. I'll have one of each.
Good job! I'll report it!
